page.description: Specify the in-line style for the container row that contains the 'Fetch More' control. For example, to center the 'Fetch More' button, enter: text-align: center;

section.description: Clicking the [...] button next to the 'Fetch More' container style property opens the style editor. This allows you to make a number of adjustments to the container's CSS, such as setting border types and widths, background colors and images, and more. Here are some examples of altered container styles.
